spiritsExplanation:
The workout title "Open Rhythm Row" and description "listen to your body... open rhythm" suggest a connection with the body's natural flow and rhythm, supported by the Soul/Funk/Disco music genre. This aligns strongly with the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit, scoring 0.8.

The mention of being outside on a river supports the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit, scoring 0.7, as this uses the natural environment and adds an exploratory dimension to the workout.

The "Workout intensity level: 3 out of 3" and interval format imply a high intensity level, contributing to the "High-Energy & Intense" spirit, scoring 0.6. However, the presence of diverse music genres and "open rhythm" softens the pure intensity classification.

Overall, "Flow & Rhythm" and "Outdoor & Adventure" take precedence, with "High-Energy & Intense" as a secondary influence.
